Height.tooltip: Changes the height of the player. Vanilla: 1

Radius.tooltip: Changes the width & length of the player. Vanilla: 1

Resize Collider.tooltip: Resizing the player collider will allow the hatchling to fit into smaller spaces, but movement can be a tad buggy when moving against walls. Recommended: Height Only

Enable Stools.tooltip: Adds stools to the solar system to help the hatchling do things that are difficult to do when they are shorter. ENABLING/DISABLING THIS REQUIRES A RELOAD.

Auto-Adjust Stool Height.tooltip: Stools will automatically be scaled to perfectly make up the difference in player height.

Stool Height.tooltip: How tall stools will be compared to a FULL HEIGHT player. Recommended: 1 - 'Height'. DOES NOTHING IF Auto-Adjust Stool Height IS ENABLED.

Change Pitch Depending on Height.tooltip: The player will be higher pitched when shorter, and lower pitched when taller.
